QuestData.Title: Jarod's Mission
QuestData.Description: Since Maiev chased after Gul'dan at the Vault of the Wardens, her sisters among the Wardens have been searching far and wide for her whereabouts.$B$BWith so few Wardens remaining, I volunteered to join the search. I hope I will find sign of her within Black Rook Hold.$B$BThe fortress will be well guarded, and I will need help to break through. Help me find her, and I will reward you handsomely.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Jarod Shadowsong at Ravencrest Mausoleum.
QuestData.RewardText: What does the Legion want with Ravencrest? He was dead and buried ten millennia ago.
